title: The Blockchain Experience
description:
Media3 Labs LLC
Welcome To The Blockchain Experience, a podcast hosted by meta-david, where we dive deep into the world of blockchain technology including, web3, NFTs, and decentralized systems.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.subtitle: In this conversation, meta-david interviews Sandy Carter from Unstoppable Domains. They discuss the benefits of Web3 and the features of Unstoppable Domains, such as easy domain ownership and digital identity. Sandy emphasizes the importance...
